Majestic fireball, then sonic boom. Two note theme in score. Both notes, gnawing at the soul, giving pause. Saying “we’ve come to this. We were always going to come to this.” Two notes, and a certain duality. Both pulling at each other. 10,000 feet of self-importance up against the shockwave of consequence. It’s not just one or the other.
